segments.text: I have to run to the grocery store .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you hate fighting the crowds on the weekends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I am out of food and milk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What store do you shop at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The small one , just down the street . I like their generic brand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been using the store across town for years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hear they have very nice stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They do , but they're a little expensive on certain items .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you should try my store . The prices are good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will sometime . Thanks for the advice .
segments.speaker: S1
